Policy.acknowledgement_statement: “The authors acknowledge the contribution of data from GWAS of Heroin Dependence supported by R01DA17305 and accessed through dbGAP to the analysis presented in this communication, i.e. publication, presentation, or grant application.”
Policy.ic_specific_access_term:
Allowed uses of data vary across the data sets contributing to our project as follows:
1=Substance dependence only – 1)Western Australia Institute of Medical Research cases; 2) Yale cases and controls
2=Substance dependence and related phenotypes – 1) Queensland Institute of Medical Research controls
3=Substance dependence, related phenotypes, childhood trauma, personality, other psychiatric and behavioral problems, and related medical problems 1) New South Wales cases and neighborhood controls

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Substance Use Dependence Only
ConsentGroup.name: SUD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: This dataset is restricted to research questions related to substance dependence only.

ConsentGroup.title: Research on Alcohol and Tobacco Related Phenotypes
ConsentGroup.name: RATRP
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Consented to general research use with respect to alcohol and tobacco related phenotypes

ConsentGroup.title: Substance Dependence, Childhood Trauma and Related Disorders
ConsentGroup.name: SUDCT
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: This dataset is restricted to research questions related to substance dependence and related phenotypes, childhood trauma, personality, other psychiatric and behavioral problems, and related medical problems only.

ConsentGroup.title: Alcohol Related Conditions
ConsentGroup.name: ARC
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Research on alcohol and alcohol related disorders and phenotypes. Consented to general research use with respect to alcohol and alcohol related disorders and phenotypes
